title: Studio
p1: On the first floor of our large 19th-century estate, a small and cozy studio-style apartment is ready for you. Its windows face west and offer a charming view of the entire valley.
p2: The spacious room, furnished in a simple rustic style, offers a double bed, a single bed, and a sofa that can be unfolded (2 extra beds).
p3: The kitchenette is equipped with a refrigerator, a two-burner electric stove, a kettle, a microwave, a small baking oven, and cooking utensils. Basic spices are also available. Additionally, there is a dining area, a glass cabinet, and storage space.

pricelist.p1: per person and night. For groups of 3 or more people.
pricelist.p3: Recreational fee in the municipality of Červená Voda per night for a person over 18 years old.

rezervationText.p1: For a binding reservation, we will issue an invoice for bank transfer payment.
rezervationText.p2: If you are unable to check in due to your own reasons, we will refund 70% of the invoiced amount.
rezervationText.p3: In case of cancellation due to government regulations, we will refund the full invoiced amount.
